headline: Lowe's Pledges $1 Million to Support Hurricane Recovery and Rebuilding Efforts in Jamaica
summary: Lowe's today announced a $1 million donation to support hurricane recovery and rebuilding efforts in Jamaica after the devastating impact of Hurricane Melissa earlier this week. As a part of the company's long-standing commitment to helping communities when they need it most, the donation will provide grants and product donations to nonprofit relief partners.
